title: Riomaggiore - The Jewel of Cinque Terre

seo.title: Riomaggiore Guide 2025 | Southernmost Cinque Terre Village
seo.description: Discover Riomaggiore, the vibrant southernmost village of Cinque Terre. Explore colorful cliff houses, Via dell'Amore, harbor dining, and authentic Italian charm.

body.title: Where Cinque Terre Begins
body.subtitle: The southernmost village cascades down the cliff in a vibrant display of pastel houses, fishing boats, and authentic Italian charm. Gateway to the famous Via dell'Amore.

body.title: The Most Authentic Cinque Terre Experience

features.title: Iconic Colorful Houses
features.description: Torre-houses painted in vibrant yellows, pinks, and oranges stacked dramatically on the cliffsides

features.title: Via dell'Amore
features.description: Starting point of the famous Lover's Walk, the most romantic coastal path in Italy

features.title: Working Harbor
features.description: Authentic fishing village with boats, harbor cafes, and fresh seafood restaurants

features.title: Vibrant Nightlife
features.description: The liveliest evening scene in Cinque Terre with harbor bars and local wine
Steep medieval streets, hidden staircases, and countless photo opportunities around every corner

features.title: Perfect Gateway
features.description: Easy train access makes it ideal starting point for exploring all five villages

body.title: Start Exploring Riomaggiore
body.description: Discover the best restaurants, hotels, hiking trails, and hidden gems of this spectacular village.
